glsa.title: Cairo: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in Cairo, the worst of which could cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Cairo is a 2D vector graphics library with cross-device output support.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Cairo. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Cairo users should upgrade to the latest version:
